    • printBookshelves

      public static void printBookshelves(List<String> players, Map<String,Set<Tile>> bookshelves, String myName, String currentPlayer)
      Prints a bookshelf
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players (the order of the players in the list is the order of the bookshelves)
      bookshelves - the map of bookshelves
      myName - the nickname of the client
      currentPlayer - the nickname of the current player
